success.title: Congratulations, you now have SubReader Plus!
success.content: Download SubReader to your phone and access a world of movies and series with read-out subtitles.

summary.title: Overview
summary.binding: No binding. Cancel at any time.

monthly.seoDescription: Start having your subtitles read aloud across streaming services with a SubReader Plus subscription.

yearly.seoDescription: Start having your subtitles read aloud across streaming services with a SubReader Plus subscription.
